评论详情: I really wanted to like these. I wear the regular weight dickies carpenter pants for work but they are just a little bit too tight for my liking. sadly they are so ridiculously low rise that wearing them for actual work where you have to kneel over and pick things up is completely pointless as they just ride down and cause your boxers to get all twisted up. I am just literally constantly readjusting my boxers and tucking my shirt in over and over and over again when I wear these.I've tried with like four or five different belts now and it's the same story. 评论概述: Small pocket openings and side pocket not for a larger cell phone
评论详情: Pant size is 38x34, relaxed fit carpenter duck jean. Straight leg.  Rear pockets are huge. Tool loop as well. Too bad the trend doesn’t continue.The front pockets are small, the opening is as well. With sweaty swollen hands, I work construction, this won’t be very accessible.  The side pocket is small as well. No, I don’t want a cargo pant. I have a Iphone13 pro max, the case is a otterbox defender. Fitting isn’t even close. Sure would be handy not to have to use a case holder appendage or put the phone in a bending area just to have it on me. So no, front or back pocket isn’t a good spot while working, talking physical labor not walking around.  I’ve been using the side pocket on pants since cell phones. This isn’t some new invention. Carhartt pants fit my phone snugly, no worries on the motorcycle. Otherwise the pants fit fine. Just don’t expect big roomy front pockets or a cellphone holding side pocket. Bummer, I really liked these pants.
Lighter duck material than Carhartt, good for warmer weather.

Great material! Got this originally for my fiance's Shaggy costume (I was Velma) and he loves them, uses them for work and such! Great material, durable, easy to wash. Will buy again! He looks great in them too!

Prompt shipping, well made & good fit. These can be for work, casual & even business casual. Very versatile. I purchased them for my picky husband & he wears them a lot. In fact, I purchased more in different colors.

You look so sharp, so put-together In those pants, no one can be better  So don't you fret, don't you fuss About those pants, they're a must For they make my heart skip and flutter My love, you look great in duck pants, no other.

评论概述: It’s a good pair of work pants
评论详情: I did some pretty heavy trail building work with these pants. They stand up to constant squatting and large leg movements without ripping. However the color is much lighter than expected. I expected a chocolate brown and got dirt brown, this led to the pants staining easier with the sap and other oils I was working around. The hold up in the wash without much shrinkage, and with the right tools you can make them water resistant.
